mapper.insert: insert into SavingBase (dclsMonth, comNum, prdNum, comName, prdName, joinWay, interest, spclCnd, maxLimit, joinMember, etcNote, dclsStart) values (#{dclsMonth}, #{comNum}, #{prdNum}, #{comName}, #{prdName}, #{joinWay}, #{interest}, #{spclCnd}, #{maxLimit}, #{joinMember}, #{etcNote}, #{dclsStart})

insert into SavingOption (comNum, prdNum, intrRate, intrRate2, saveTrm, rsrvTypeName, intrRateTypeName) values (#{comNum}, #{prdNum}, #{intrRate}, #{intrRate2}, #{saveTrm}, #{rsrvTypeName}, #{intrRateTypeName})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM savingBase ORDER BY prdNum
